members.signatureBeforeChange: public void drawArc(int x, int y, int width, int height, int startAngle, int arcAngle)
members.signatureAfterChange: public void drawArc(int x, int y, int width, int height, int startAngle, int arcAngle)
diff: -		Cairo.cairo_translate(cairo, x + offset + width / 2f, y + offset + height / 2f);
